pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variable Selection for Optimal Individualized Dynamic Treatment Regime // Sequential advantage selection (SAS, Fan, Lu and Song, 2016) arXiv:1405.5239 and penalized A-learning (PAL, Shi, et al., 2018) methods are implement for selecting important variables involved in optimal individualized (dynamic) treatment regime in both single-stage or multi-stage studies.
